Prerequisites ðŸ“‹

Installation Steps ðŸ› ï¸

git clone https://github.com/All-Hands-AI/OpenHands.git
cd OpenHands

2. Create and Activate Conda Environment

conda create -n opendevin python=3.11
conda activate opendevin

3. Install Docker

After installing Docker, you need to add your user account to the docker-users group: a. Open Computer Management (Press Win + X and select Computer Management) b. Navigate to Local Users and Groups > Groups c. Find docker-users, right-click, and select "Add to Group" d. Add your user account e. Sign out and sign back in for changes to take effect f. Verify installation by running docker run hello-world in a command prompt

4. Pull Docker Image

docker pull ghcr.io/opendevin/sandbox:v0.1

5. Set Up WORK_SPACE

(opendevin) D:\>set WORKSPACE_DIR=D:\OpenHands

6. Install Poetry and Project Dependencies. First, ensure Poetry is installed:

pip install poetry
poetry install

7. Set Up and Build the Frontend. Ensure you have Node.js and npm installed. Then:

cd frontend
npm install
npm run build
cd ..

8. Start the Backend Server. After successfully building the frontend, start the backend server:

uvicorn openhands.server.listen:app --reload --port 3000

9. Start the Frontend Development Server. In a new terminal window

cd frontend
npm run start -- --port 3001
